  • Constructor Details

    • CashierController

      public CashierController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

    • findAssetForName

      private File findAssetForName(String name)
      Find an asset image file that best matches the supplied menu item name. Uses a set of heuristics and mappings to match filenames in FrontEnd/Assets.
      Parameters:
      name - the menu item name to match against asset filenames
      Returns:
      a File pointing to the image if found, or null if no asset exists

    • pickRandomCustomer

      private void pickRandomCustomer()
      Selects a random customer from the `customers` table and updates the customer info label in the UI. If no customer exists, clears selection. This method handles SQL errors internally and updates the UI accordingly.

    • updateRedeemState

      private void updateRedeemState()
      Updates the state of the redeem button based on the current cart subtotal and the selected customer's available pearls. Disables redeem when redemption is already applied or the customer lacks sufficient pearls.

    • redeemOrder

      private void redeemOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • openAdjustmentsPopup

      private void openAdjustmentsPopup(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • closePopup

      private void closePopup(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • addItemToCart

      private void addItemToCart(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • calculateCartTotal

      private double calculateCartTotal()
      Calculates the current cart subtotal (sum of individual item prices, including selected toppings but excluding tax).
      Returns:
      the subtotal as a double

    • updateTotals

      private void updateTotals()
      Recomputes and updates the subtotal and tax labels shown under the cart. Reflects redeem state (shows zeros when redemption is applied) and updates the charge button text.

    • chargeOrder

      private void chargeOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • addMenuItem

      private void addMenuItem(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • addMenuButtonToView

      private void addMenuButtonToView(String name, String description, BigDecimal price, boolean isModification)
      Creates a Button representing a menu item and inserts it into the `menuVBox` layout in the first available slot (left-to-right). The button contains an optional image and a wrapped label so full names are visible.
      Parameters:
      name - the menu item display name
      description - optional description shown in a tooltip
      price - the item's price as BigDecimal
      isModification - whether this menu item is a modification/topping

    • updateMenuPrice

      private void updateMenuPrice(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • showError

      private void showError(String message)
      Displays an error alert with the provided message on the JavaFX Application Thread.
      Parameters:
      message - the user-visible error message to show

    • openInventoryView

      private void openInventoryView(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • openAnalyticsView

      private void openAnalyticsView(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • openManageEmployeesView

      private void openManageEmployeesView(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • loadAndSwitchScene

      private void loadAndSwitchScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent e, String classpathPath, String filenameOnly)
      Helper: try to find an FXML resource (classpath or filesystem) and switch the current Stage's scene to the loaded FXML.
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent used to obtain the current Stage
      classpathPath - the expected classpath location of the FXML
      filenameOnly - a fallback relative file name inside FrontEnd/

    • togglePopupButton

      private void togglePopupButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • isChildOf

      private boolean isChildOf(javafx.scene.Node child, javafx.scene.layout.HBox box)
      Checks whether the supplied node is a direct child of the given HBox.
      Parameters:
      child - the node to test
      box - the HBox parent
      Returns:
      true if the child is contained directly in the box, false otherwise

    • isIceOrSweetness

      private boolean isIceOrSweetness(String name)
      Heuristic check to determine if the supplied name corresponds to an ice/sweetness modifier (for example "Less Ice", "No Sugar", "Half Sweetness"). Used to exclude these modifiers from the toppings list.
      Parameters:
      name - the menu item name to examine
      Returns:
      true if the name likely represents ice/sweetness control

    • openAdjustments

      private void openAdjustments(String drinkName)
      Open the adjustments popup for the provided drink name and set internal selection state.
      Parameters:
      drinkName - the display name of the drink to adjust

    • loadMenuItemsFromDatabase

      private void loadMenuItemsFromDatabase()
      Loads menu items and modifications from the database (ordered by id) and populates the menu buttons and toppings UI accordingly. Ice/sweetness modifiers are skipped for the toppings area.

    • getButtonLabelText

      private String getButtonLabelText(javafx.scene.control.Button b)
      Returns the visible label text for a button. If the Button itself has no text, searches inside the graphic (for example a VBox with a Label) and returns that label text.
      Parameters:
      b - the Button to inspect
      Returns:
      the display text for the button, or null if none found

    • closeAdjustments

      private void closeAdjustments()
      Close the adjustments popup, apply any pending selections to internal state, and hide the popup UI.

    • resetPopupState

      private void resetPopupState()
      Reset the popup UI state (clear selected ice, sweetness, and toppings) so the next time the popup is opened it starts from a clean slate.

    • getPriceFromDatabase

      private double getPriceFromDatabase(String drinkName)
      Lookup a menu item's price from the database by name (non-modification lookup). Returns 0.0 when the price cannot be found or on error.
      Parameters:
      drinkName - the menu item name to query
      Returns:
      the price as a double

    • getPriceFromDatabase

      private double getPriceFromDatabase(String drinkName, boolean requireIsMod)
      Lookup a menu item's price from the database with an option to require that the record be a modification (is_modification = true).
      Parameters:
      drinkName - the menu item name to query
      requireIsMod - if true, only consider rows where is_modification=true
      Returns:
      the price as a double

    • getMenuItemIdByName

      private Integer getMenuItemIdByName(String name, boolean requireIsMod)
      Resolve a menu item id by name. Tries exact match, case-insensitive, and ILIKE substring fallbacks. When requireIsMod is true, prefers modification rows.
      Parameters:
      name - the display name to resolve
      requireIsMod - whether to prefer modification rows
      Returns:
      the menu_items.id if found, or null if not found

    • addDrinkToCart

      private void addDrinkToCart()
      Assembles the currently selected drink and applied modifiers into a cart row and inserts it into the cart view. Prices are derived from menu_items and from selected toppings.

    • getInventoryItemIdByName

      private int getInventoryItemIdByName(String name, Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Returns the inventory item id for a given inventory name using the provided DB connection.
      Parameters:
      name - the inventory item name to look up
      conn - an open SQL connection to use for the query
      Returns:
      the inventory id, or -1 if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getLastInsertId

      private int getLastInsertId(Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Returns the last inserted id from the current connection using database-specific mechanisms (helper for INSERT ... RETURNING wrappers).
      Parameters:
      conn - the SQL connection to query
      Returns:
      the last inserted id
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
